content.rendered:
This reparative serum assists in brightening skin tone and fading dark spots to promote an even complexion.
Bioactive native extracts of Kakadu Plum, Snowflower and White Cypress Leaf are combined with fruit enzymes,
vitamins and antioxidants to reduce age-related damage, blemishes and pigmentation. This gentle exfoliating
serum promotes a refined complexion that exudes luminosity and brightness.

*Vitamin A and may not be suitable for sensitive skin or during pregnancy or breastfeeding.

 

For Ageing skin with visible signs of ageing including sun damage, uneven skin tone and pigmentation.

excerpt.rendered:
• Creates luminosity and a clear radiant complexion
  • Reduce age spots, blemishes and dark pigmented areas
  • Prevent and slow signs and appearance of ageing
  • Supports the skin’s natural desquamation process and improves the visible signs of photoageing
  • Suited to normal, dry and oily skin types
